name: Tiny silver key - Aquí está mi corazón.
description:
This little silver key is hand cast and textured and is attached to a special ring which reads in Spanish "Here is my heart"

The key is barely 2cm long and hangs from a bust length silver chain. A perfect gift for someone special to you. 

Silver keys are considered lucky in many cultures, especially when hung above the bed at night.

Only one of these keys available.

name: Windfall lucky silver apple necklace
description:
Celebrating the "windfall" the unexpected good things that happen come our way. 

The windfall apple is one that will drop from the tree when it's good and ready, by which time it'll be ripe and sweet and perfect to eat... Fortune is on your side if you are to encounter the windfall before the worm. 

These wonderfully delicate little apples are hand cast and sculpted, then textured to give each one a different look and feel. These pendants are nice weighty and hang from a delicate sterling silver medium-long (around bust length) chain. Each tiny leaf is carefully handcut and individually rustically letter stamped with the word "windfall." 

These pendants are polished and oxidised to a part rough and smooth finish with imperfections left in for texture and charm.

Only four available.

name: Pregnancy and New Born Bell Necklace
description:
This beautiful little brass bell is designed to hang low against the tummy during pregnancy where it will tinkle gently. Whilst growing, the baby comes to recognise the sound as a familiar association with mother and once born it is historically thought that the bell may be used as a comforting sound for baby. 

Can be personalised with baby bump's nickname for a little extra, please enquire before purchase.

name: Neolithic Flint Arrowhead Silver Necklace
description:
A Neolithic flint arrowhead set in silver. A piece that speaks of our ancestors, their lives and their impressive craftsmanship.

These arrowheads are thousands of years old and are thought to have been designed for hunting game.

Flint is a naturally strong, crystalline material fragile to shock so be careful not to drop your arrowhead. 

The silver chain is about 26cm in length, the arrowhead is about 1.5cm long and the silver setting is about 2cm long.

name: Mediaeval Style Rutilated Quartz Amulet Silver Necklace
description:
Silvery-white rutiles criss-cross the inside of this beautiful quartz crystal amulet. The silver setting has been lovingly hammered and softened to suit the contours of the stone. 

The long silver chain will allow this to hang below the bust. The stone is around 3cm in length.

name: Crystal Pyramid Silver Necklace
description:
Various colourful natural mineral stones cut into a pyramid shape, backed onto handmade sterling silver settings and fixed on silver chains.

Available in black onyx, red jasper, blue sodalite, angelite, and green serpentine, each pyramid has a hand cut finish with small imperfections that we think add to the piece. The unique texture and colour of each stone combined with the striking geometric shape make for an eye-catching modern necklace.

The stone measures about 1cm across the base and the silver chain is about 45cm in length.

name: Raw Amethyst Stone Necklace
description:
Amethyst is a variety of quartz with lustrous purple or violet tones created by trace elements of iron in the structure of the crystal. 

These raw, uncut stones were mined in Kenya and set by Beth in a simple silver pendant to show off the natural beauty and uniqueness of each stone. The silver chain is about 33cm long the stone about 2cm in length.

The name amethyst is derived from the ancient Greek for "intoxicating" - the Greeks believed the wearer would be protected from drunkenness. 

Amethyst is the traditional birthstone for February.

name: Rutilated Quartz Sphere Necklace
description:
Rutilated quartz sphere, set in place with a single band of engraved silver. Peachy, milky colours contrast with the needle-like red and silver rutile embedded in this natural mineral. 

Rutile means "reddish" in latin. Folklore attributes energizing properties to quartz crystals. Science has some real world applications for quartz - it has piezoelectric properties meaning it develops an electric potential under mechanical stress. 


The engraving on this light-catching, dreamy piece reads:

"mellow moons & happy skies".

The silver chain is about 31cm in length and the sphere measures 2cm in diameter.

name: Wren Farthing Birdcage Necklace On Long Silver Chain
description:
Inspired by a number of pieces of trench-art, (naive art created from scraps of materials including coins and bullet casings by soldiers serving in various wars) this 1951 farthing depicting a sweet little wren has been re-homed inside this handmade birdcage. 

Complete with a long silver chain to be worn low on the body and standing at around 2.5inches high, this birdcage necklace is designed as a larger, more statemental piece of jewellery. The interior of the cage is oxidised and the silver of the piece is beautifully hammered and softened with scuffs and marks left in to show off the hand crafting.

name: Vintage Glass Marble Pendant Necklace
description:
Glass marbles from yesterday's playgrounds lovingly re-purposed into beautiful light-catching pendants with a single silver band and chain.

Held up to the light, the vintage glass marble pendant necklace shows the tiny marks of being part of a much loved children's game.

These are giant marbles, so larger than your average, about 2.5cm wide.

name: Victorian Threepence Customizable Love Token Necklace
description:
These coins over 100 years old, have been lovingly repurposed into beautiful Love Token Necklaces and are customisable with up to 3 letters.

Choose from a fancy uppercase script for initials or a lowercase handscript for short names. After checkout, please use the contact form to send me your lettering specifications. 

These pendants come with a fine trace medium length chain as standard but can be purchased with a fancier chain for a little extra upon request. 

You can find a blog post on the "News & Stories" section about my Love Token collection for further insight.

name: Heart Love Token - Victorian threepence
description:
This beautiful threepence coin has been lovingly repurposed into a love token. Featuring a hand embellished heart motif in the centre this would be an ideal present for a loved one. 

This coin is blank on the back. 

There are two of this item currently in stock. As they are individually handmade your coin may differ slightly from the image opposite. If you'd like a photograph sending of the exact coin you'll receive please contact me and I'll happy email one to you.

name: Love Letters
description:
These tiny little envelopes can be customised for any purpose. Choose from up to 6 characters on the front and four on the back and use the contact form to let me know what you'd like your envelope to say. Perfect as wedding or bridesmaids' gifts, a love token or a sentimental gift for a friend.. or what the hey? just buy one and treat yourself. 

Envelopes measure around 1.5cm and hang from a 19" sterling silver fine trace chain. 

Please allow up to 3 weeks for this custom order, though I will often turn around much sooner. For any queries or if you need this piece for a specific date please do get in touch and I'll do my best to accomodate your order.

name: Friendship Necklace - 1933 lucky silver sixpence
description:
**MADE TO ORDER**

"To Have A Friend Is To Be One" 

The lucky silver six pence pops up in all sorts of places .. Christmas puddings, the bride to be's shoe, sewn into air force uniforms for good fortune.. It's definitely a good coin to be around. 

As a child I was totally in love with those friendship necklaces you could find in a well known catalogue - two halves that when put together make a whole. This sentiment was probably galvanised through watching too much of The Mysterious Cities Of Gold cartoon. 

This necklace is a slightly more grown up version of that. 

A beautiful 1933 silver sixpence has been repurposed into these two lovingly hand letter stamped silver necklaces that hang from 20" fine trace chain. 

This is item is currently not in stock but can be made to order - please allow up to two weeks. If required sooner please get in touch as express orders can often be accomodated.

name: Little houses
description:
These adorable bone china thimbles have been repurposed into lovely long necklaces. 

Each strung onto a fine sterling silver chain these necklaces would be great as friendship gifts for friends from the same neighbourhood. 

Also available with a customisable handmade silver envelope for a little extra if giving as a gift for a special occassion. Please allow a week and a half for custom orders and use the contact form after purchase to let me know what you'd like the envelope to say. 


There are currently only 7 of these thimbles available and I cannot guarantee I'll be able to get specific designs back into stock, so grab them while you can!

options.name: White Town House with bay window Thimble - £20

name: Solid Silver Antique Thimble and Long Chain
description:
These antique solid silver thimbles have been turned into beautiful sweetheart necklaces. Date ranging from the late 19th century to pre second world war they have all slightly different marking and are british Sterling silver hallmarked.


They hang from a long silver chain and there are currently three to choose from - Large (top), Medium (middle) or Small (bottom).

Also available on a beautiful solid silver antique style figaro chain for a little extra.

name: Spring Chickens
description:
Here are two lovely antique carved bone charms both on fine sterling silver chains. 

Choose from the wonderfully silly hen necklace complete with a solid silver cast egg or this proud little cock on a 20" necklace. 

Only these two available. These are very rare and collectable charms shipped over from Ireland and it's unlikely I'll ever find these again. 

Discounted rate if bought together, please contact me if interested.

name: Yorkshire Panda
description:
Antique Handcarved Panda Necklace

This wonderful little handcarved panda ornament has been repurposed into a necklace.

Hanging from a fine, medium length sterling silver chain this is a lovely item for an animal lover.  

I imported this little ornament in from the US because I love the detail of the carving so much. He is super rare and I doubt I will find another so grab him whilst he's available.

name: 30" Sterling Silver Chains
description:
These chains are made to order from a selection of different guage silver. At 30" inches they hang nice and long, around bust level. 

Choose from a very fine trace chain (for delicate jewellery), a medium chain (a little stronger for everyday wear) or a beautiful fancy figaro for an extra special addition to your silver pendants. 

Each chain comes with a standard boltring and 4mm loop, please measure the jump ring on your pendants before ordering to make sure you'll be able to thread your silver through - alternatively I can supply you with an open jump ring for you to attach your pendants to. 

Please contact me if you have any questions or would like a different size and I'd be happy accomodate.  As these chains are made to order please allow up to a week and a half, though often I will ship within a couple of days.

name: Antique Elephant Ox Bone Carved Necklace
description:
This gorgeous handcarved oxbone ornament dates from around the 1920s and has been repurposed into a lovely necklace. 

Charm hangs from a fine sterling silver trace chain. 

Only one currently available, these charms are highly collectable and quite hard to find.

name: Amethyst Tiny Pyramid Necklace
description:
These tiny amethyst crystals measure around 1cm wide from the base and have been backed onto handmade sterling silver settings and fixed onto approximately 18" silver chains. 

According to my spiritual friend, these crystals carry healing properties and amethyst apparently increases nobility, inner peace, healing and relieves stress alongside many other qualities - the perfect crystal for hectic times!

Please note both the silver and the crystals have a rough, handcut finish with blemishes and dints left in for charm. This sale is for one necklace only. These pictures show the necklaces hanging with the crystal point down but they will of course move around and point in different directions as you wear them.


Only two available in this colour, but check out my other listings for more.

name: French Love Token Thimble
description:
This old thimble has the handstamped phrase "You and no other" Incorporated into the body of the antique piece. 

The sweetheart necklace is designed as love token for your significant other and is attached to (aprx 20") sterling silver trace chain, to be worn long on the body. 

This is a unique gift, currently only one like this available.

name: "Darling" Silver Thimble Sweetheart Necklace
description:
Fans of J.M Barrie will recall that when Wendy tells Peter Pan that she is going to give him a kiss it is a thimble that Peter receives. 

Inspired by the story, this thimble has 'Darling' (Wendy's surname as well as a term of endearment) handstamped onto a panel that has been incorporated into a very old solid silver thimble.

These sweetheart necklaces are designed to be given as love tokens to the people you care most about.


Comes attached to a sterling silver trace chain.

Currently 2 in stock, please be aware these are handmade items on antique thimbles so your thimble may vary from the image shown. If you'd like to see the exact thimble you'll receive please contact me and I will happily send you images of the thimbles I currently have in stock.

name: "Savages" Antique Carved Black Forest Bear Brooch
description:
These great little bears were handcarved many, many years ago in the black forest and have now been repurposed as brooches for you to wear.

Carrying the words "Savages" on their little collars, these bears are open to your own interpretations.

Backed onto a silver plated stick pin, with an additional sterling silver security chain and pin, with some chinks and marks from the passage of time these delightful bears tell many stories. 

These bears are old and delicate, but will last well if handled with care! They are about 37mm wide. 

There are only two brooches, please choose a 'left facing' bear or 'right facing' in the options.

name: "We Spin Like Atoms" Handcarved Standing Black Forest Bear Necklace
description:
"Language tethers us to the world; without it we spin like atoms." Penelope Lively

This lovely little bear hangs from a long silver chain and carries a message intended to remind us that we aren't so distant from the wild beasts that get to roam the world untamed. 

The original bears were hand carved in the Black Forest many, many years ago and have been repurposed from tiny ornaments to be worn as necklaces. They are wonderfully tactile and beautifully made with a few chinks here and there from their age. 

The bear is about 37mm wide and just over 20mm high.

This is part of a collection of four bears, all unique and one of a kind.
